text:
- I'm Remia Mathew. I'm a
Principal Solutions Architect.
In my role, I work with AWS customers
throughout their cloud journey,
helping them build the right solutions
and achieve their business goals
through AWS technology.
I did not have any hands-on
AWS experience before joining,
but the ramp-up period really helped me

to learn more about AWS
and take certifications.
To succeed as a solution architect,

one of the main things you
need is that passion to learn,
and passion for technology,
because technology changes all the time.
Another thing you need is to understand

the customer's perspective,
look at that bigger picture,

and understand what
they're trying to achieve,
and then use technology to enable them
to achieve those goals.

The people I work with, they
have that innovative spirit,

the drive to learn new things
and try out new things,
and really great environment to work with.
(upbeat music)
